scripts.dev: cd ../../ && cross-var yarn cross-env MODE=local nuxt-ts -c src/$npm_package_name/nuxt.config.js
scripts.generate:dev: cd ../../ && cross-var yarn cross-env MODE=dev nuxt-ts generate -c src/$npm_package_name/nuxt.config.js
scripts.generate:release: cd ../../ && cross-var yarn cross-env MODE=release nuxt-ts generate -c src/$npm_package_name/nuxt.config.js
